Metrics/MethodLength.description:
Description

Avoid methods longer than 10 lines of code.
Metrics/MethodLength.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

CountComments: False (type: bool)
Max: 10 (type: int)
CountAsOne: [] (type: list)
AllowedMethods: [] (type: list)
AllowedPatterns: [] (type: list)
